content: stylin tote bag designed by cathy phillips © 2008 hooks g for bag and f for straps yarn 640-670 yard worsted weight 525 yds main color 138 yds 2nd color gauge 20 single_crochet = 4 in and 19 row single_crochet = 4 in note all rounds are joined at the end while i made this bag with two colors i am going to present the directions as it were one color bag chain 40 round 1 1 single_crochet in
